Consume Wechaty Puppet Service## Usage```pythonimport asynciofrom wechaty import Wechatyfrom wechaty_puppet_service import PuppetServicebot = Wechaty(PuppetService("your-token-here"))bot.on('message', lambda x: print(x))asyncio.run(bot.start())```## Environment Variables### 1 `WECHATY_PUPPET_SERVICE_TOKEN`The token set to this environment variable will become the default value of `puppetOptions.token````shWECHATY_PUPPET_SERVICE_TOKEN=secret python bot.py```or you can use `TOKEN` or `token` environment variable alias name to set **token**, for example:```shellTOKEN=secret python bot.py# ortoken=secret python bot.py```## History### master### v0.7 (Mar, 2021)Rename from `wechaty-puppet-hostie` -> `wechaty-puppet-service`### v0.0.1 (Mar 10, 2020)1.
